name: @kdinisv/nosqli
description: Lightweight NoSQL injection scanner (inspired by NoSQLMap, CLI & library API similar to sql-scanner).

scripts.scan:juice: npm run build && node dist/cli.js http://localhost:3000 -F -C --max-pages 60 --max-depth 3 --delay 20
scripts.scan:juice:save: npm run build && node dist/cli.js http://localhost:3000 -F -C --max-pages 60 --max-depth 3 --delay 20 > scan-juice.json
scripts.scan:juice:login: npm run build && node dist/cli.js http://localhost:3000/rest/user/login -F -X POST -f email,password -d '{"email":"a@b.c","password":"a"}'
scripts.scan:juice:login:save: npm run build && node dist/cli.js http://localhost:3000/rest/user/login -F -X POST -f email,password -d '{"email":"a@b.c","password":"a"}' > scan-juice-login.json
scripts.scan:juice:orders:ps: powershell -NoProfile -Command "$t = (npm run -s token:juice); node dist/cli.js http://localhost:3000/api/Orders -F -H 'Authorization: Bearer ' + $t -g q --dos --dos-threshold 800"
scripts.scan:juice:orders:save: powershell -NoProfile -Command "$t = (npm run -s token:juice); node dist/cli.js http://localhost:3000/api/Orders -F -H 'Authorization: Bearer ' + $t -g q --dos --dos-threshold 800 > scan-juice-orders.json"
